rules_text:
Flying, vigilance
[i]Retainer[/i] – Noble spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
[i]Perfectionist[/i] – Whenever Subaki, Mr. Perfect deals damage, put a +1/+1 counter onto him.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Subaki attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, support 1.
